Reviews.Title: “Worst Hotel EVER”
Reviews.Author: EGTESkyGod Posted by an OctopusTravel traveler
Reviews.Content: hotel terrible booked double en suite facilities arrived twin beds opposite sink corner team shower corridor reception booking information staff rude obnoxious french refused correct charging found price difference zero pay otherwise stay trust tried elsewhere manager mike chris richard branson wannabe judging unprofessional rude walked help lifts moved top floor suitcases didnt offer help proved lied website numerous complaints written havent received refund upgrade entitled emails months ignored august hotel ruined otherwise excellent 4 days london recommend stay hotel rude unprofessional obnoxious arrogant staff please feel free contact hotel

HotelInfo.Name: Fairways Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: 186 Sussex Gardens, London W2 1TU, England
